mapper.select: select * from space where (space_category, space_no) in ( select space_category, max (space_no) from space group by space_category ) order by space_no desc

SELECT REV_NO, SPACE_NAME, REV_NOTE, REV_RATE, MEM_NAME, MEM_IMG FROM (SELECT R.REV_NO, S.SPACE_NAME, R.REV_NOTE, R.REV_RATE, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_IMG FROM SPACE S INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON R.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO ORDER BY REV_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

select s.space_no, avg(r.rev_rate) rev_rate, count(r.mem_no) count,count(DISTINCT(FAV_NO)) favorite, s.mem_no , s.space_category,space_addr1,space_addr2, s.SPACE_INTRO1,s.SPACE_IMG1,m.mem_img from SPACE s FULL OUTER join review r on r.space_no =s.space_no FULL OUTER join MEMBER m on s.mem_no = m.mem_no FULL OUTER join FAVORITE f on s.space_no = f.space_no GROUP BY s.space_no, s.mem_no, s.space_category,space_addr1,space_addr2, s.SPACE_INTRO1,s.SPACE_IMG1,m.mem_img having s.space_no is not null order by rev_rate desc
